resources.string:
"Goo.im Mobile v2.1.2
Goo.im is a free android file hosting service, as well as an OTA updating platform. If you are a rom developer, feel free to distribute this APK in your rom with no strings attached.
Sorry if you don't like the waiting or ads, but we have to cover our server costs somehow!
Contact Info:
Twitter: @gooinsideme Website: http://www.goo.im
Owned by Snipanet Services Inc."
An update for your rom is available.
"If you are a developer or donator, you can now login to enjoy instant downloads for life with no advertising! http://goo.im/donate"
OpenScript is an engine for automating tasks such as quing up roms and backups from within android to be processed on the next reboot.
